review: This is a well engineered, albeit different, device. It works as advetised. If you have a question about it and go to the website noted in the simple instruction sheet you get nothing, nada, nichtn nuttin. It actually tells you the page is not there and go to home page which is set up to sell you more stuff. All I needed was to find out what to do when my available memory was used up, you know- how do I return it when I don't need it or what is eating it. Right now I will wait until it runs over and stops then call them on phone and ask for tech help and proceed like I did when I bought it.

Haven't checked out Nexflix or Hulu yet, there is enough available on Amazon Prime to keep me entertained.
